title: Luni327:The Journey Begins
description: Bryce Burns is just a normal kid with parents whose skills are very much in demand at the Northern Lunar Habitat. The year is 2037 and Mankind is starting the colonization of near Earth space. Bryce’s dad signs the family up for a chance to join five other families on a journey from Earth to the Northern Lunar Habitat where they’ll live on the Moon for at least the next two years if selected.Can the families integrate into life at the Habitat? Join Bryce on an adventure to see what it takes to turn an outpost on the edge of human habitation into the place everyone wants to live, Home.
author: Dan  Eaton
